changeSet.createView: SELECT t.id,t.stock_out_task_code, (SELECT count(DISTINCT tb.frozen_box_id) FROM stock_out_req_frozen_tube tb where tb.stock_out_task_id = t.id and tb.status !='1802' group by tb.frozen_box_id) as count_of_frozen_box , (SELECT count(tb.id) FROM stock_out_req_frozen_tube tb where tb.stock_out_task_id = t.id and tb.status !='1802') as count_of_sample , t.created_date , t.stock_out_date,t.status,t.memo,t.stock_out_plan_id,t.stock_out_head_id_1,t.stock_out_head_id_2, (u1.last_name||u1.first_name||'.'|| u2.last_name||u2.first_name) operators FROM stock_out_task t LEFT OUTER JOIN jhi_user u1 ON t.STOCK_OUT_HEAD_ID_1 = u1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN jhi_user u2 ON t.STOCK_OUT_HEAD_ID_2 = u2.id
